13887.<pc>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－死の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The copy of "Chosen's Teachings Book 4" in
your possession began to glow!

13888.白紙だったページに 文字が浮かびあがってくる。\n<pc>とヤーンは その文字を:
The blank pages are now filled with words.
<pc> and Yarn began reading them.

13889.修行も今回で 最後になるからの……。\nこれで終わりでは ないぞ。:
This training will be the last... but it won't
be the end.

13890.ガタラ原野のどこかにある グルグ地下道。\nその奥の部屋の床に 魔獣の左角と\n:
Somewhere in the Gatara Fields is the Gulug
Underpass. Place a Beast's Left and Right Horn
on the floor of the back room.

13891.そこで おぬしは 命をかけることになる。\n不退転の決意で この修行を果たせ。\:
There, you will put your life on the line.
Fulfill this training with determination.
Abandoning it now will be unacceptable.

13892.「いよいよ 来たな～。\n ドワーフの国の ガタラ原野にある洞くつが\n 最後の:
The time's finally come. Looks like the cave
in Gatara Fields is the stage for the final
training lesson.

13893.「そんじゃ～ はりきって\n 修行を 果たしにいくとしようか～。\n もちろん:
Well then, let's go and knock that training
out! Of course, I'll be coming along, too.

13894.「命をかけろって 言ってるくらいだからな～。\n 何が起こるか わからねえぜ？\:
It said we'll be "putting our lives on the
line." You never know what might happen, so
make sure you're prepared.

13895.「安心しろって～！！ なんたって\n 今回は このオレが ついてるからな～！:
But don't worry! After all, I'll be there with
you this time!

13932.「ここの床に 魔獣の左角と 魔獣の右角を\n 突きたてれば いいんだな～。:
I guess we just have to put the Beast's Left
Horn and Beast's Right Horn on the floor here.

13933.「何が起こるか お楽しみだな。\n よし <cs_pchero> 始めるか～？<:
Let's just see what happens. Okay,
<cs_pchero>, are you ready to get started?<yesno><close>

13934.「おいおい。ビビッたのか？\n オレが ついてるって言っただろ。\n いいから:
Oh, come on. Getting cold feet? I told you I
got your back. Let's just get it over with!<yesno><close>

13935.<cs_pchero>は 魔獣の左角と 魔獣の右角を\nふたつとも 床に突きたて:
<cs_pchero> placed both the Beast's Left
Horn and Beast's Right Horn on the floor...

13937.「出やがった 出やがった～！\n コイツを倒せってことのようだぜ。:
Something came out! Looks like we're supposed
to take this big guy down.

13938.「お～っと。アンタが倒さないと\n 修行失敗ってことも ありえるな～。:
Oh, right. If you don't beat him, it might
mean your training will fail.

13939.「お手並み拝見と いかせてもらうぜ。\n がんばってくれよ <cs_pchero:
Let's just see how you do. Good luck,
<cs_pchero>!

13941.「<cs_pchero> 今度はイケるよな？\n アイツは ヤル気マンマンみたい:
Think you can do it this time, <cs_pchero>?
This guy looks like he's rarin' to go.

13943.「やるじゃねえか～。ここまでの修行を\n こなしてきたチカラは ダテじゃね～な。:
Not bad! After all your training so far, that
power isn't just for show.

13944.「これで 超天道士の名は\n アンタに継がれた……のか？\n 死ぬ心配は なくな:
With this, you've inherited the title of
Chosen One... right? Now you don't have to
worry about dying, right?

13945.「おいおい <cs_pchero>。\n アンタ 手を抜いたんじゃね～だろうな？:
Hey, hey, <cs_pchero>. You didn't pull any
punches, did you?

13946.「あ～あ。結局 オレが やっちまったか。\n <cs_pchero> 平気か～？:
Ahh～, I ended up finishing it off. Are you
okay, <cs_pchero>? You're not going to die
on me, are you?

13949.「コイツは 不死身の魔物なのか！\n だとしたら コレは……マジでヤバいか？:
Is this thing immortal? If that's the case...
aren't we in a lot of trouble right now?

13950.「その魔物は 強烈なショック状態に\n おとさないかぎり 倒すことはできないと\:
I once heard from the previous Chosen One that
the creature can only be defeated by putting
it into a state of intense shock.

13952.「なんとかしないと <cs_pchero>殿は\n 本当に 死んでしまうかもしれ:
If nothing is done, <cs_pchero> may indeed
perish.

13953.「ガウラド～。お前 あの技がなきゃ\n コイツを倒せないのを 知ってたんだな。\:
Gaurad. You knew we couldn't beat it without
that technique, didn't you? Did the old man
plan all this?

13954.「はあ～。あの技は使いたくないのによ……。\n なによりも じ～さんの思うツボっ:
Haah～ I don't want to use that technique...
I don't like playing right into that old man's
hands, but I have no choice.

13955.「それなら 食らえよ！\n 超天道士直伝の必殺技！！:
Then take this! The ultimate move of the
school of the Chosen One!

13957.<cs_pchero>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－死の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The copy of "Chosen's Teachings Book 4" in
your possession began to glow!

13958.「……よくぞ 最後の修行を果たした。\n ワシが残せるものは これで すべてじゃ:
..."Well done on completing your training.
With this, I have nothing left to teach you."

13959.「超天道士の名は おぬしが受け継ぐがいい。\n その技と心 そして教えと共に。:
"You shall now inherit the title of the Chosen
One, with all the skills, heart, and teachings
that go with it."

13960.「新たな超天道士の誕生と 新たな伝説の始まりを\n ワシは あの世から見守るとし:
"I will witness the birth of a new Chosen One, and the beginning of a new legend from the afterlife"... Old man... you knew you were
going to die, didn't you?

13962.「これで あなたは\n 名実ともに 超天道士の名を\n その身に 受け継いだので:
You have now inherited the title of Chosen One
in both name and deed!

13963.「お前 もしかして オレをハメたのか？\n <cs_pchero>が死ぬって話も:
Was this all just a set-up? Were you lying
about <cs_pchero> dying?

13964.「人聞きが悪いですよ ヤーン様。\n 武闘家たる者 死の危険は\n いつ いかな:
You misunderstand me, Master Yarn. For a
martial artist, death is always close at hand.

13965.「やっちまったものは しかたないな……。\n 超天道士の名。もらうだけ もらっと:
What's done is done... the title of Chosen One
is mine now, whether I like it or not.

13966.「<cs_pchero>に 超天道士の名を\n 継いでもらおうって オレの作戦は:
My plan to have <cs_pchero> take over the
title of the Chosen One has failed. I'll be
taking back the Book of Death, now.

13967.<cs_pchero>は ヤーンに\n超天遊戯－死の書－を 返した。:
<cs_pchero> returned the copy of "Chosen's
Teachings Book 4" to Yarn.

13968.「オレのわがままで アンタを\n つきあわせちまって 悪かったな～。:
I'm sorry for putting you in this situation
because of my selfishness.

13969.「おわびと言っちゃ～アレだが\n さっきの技を アンタにも 教えてやるよ。\n:
To make up for it, I'll teach you that
technique I used earlier. It's called Roaring
Tirade.

13971.「たいしたものじゃないが コレを\n アンタに 贈らせてもらおう。: It's not much, but I'll give you this.

13972.「なあ～ 今度 オレと勝負してくれよ。\n アンタとだったら きっと\n いい闘:
Hey, you and me should fight sometime. I'm
sure I could have a good match with you.

13973.「オレも 準備に取りかかるからさ～。\n 武闘家になって また オレんとこへ来て:
I'm going to start preparing. Come back to me
again after you've advanced more as a martial
artist. See you later, <cs_pchero>!

13974.「ついに超天道士の復活が なされた！\n どれだけ この時を待ったのか……。:
At long last, the Chosen One has been reborn!
How I've waited for this moment...
